sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Save, Upload, FileText, MapPin, Calendar, User } from 'lucide-react'; const AuditForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ auditType: '', schemeName: '', location: '', district: '', state: '', auditDate: '', auditorName: '', auditorId: '', beneficiaryCount: '', fundAllocated: '', fundUtilized: '', observations: '', recommendations: '', documents: [] }); const [currentSection, setCurrentSection] = useState(0); const sections = [ 'Basic Information', 'Scheme Details', 'Financial Information', 'Audit Findings', 'Documents & Evidence' ]; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleFileUpload = (e) => { const files = Array.from(e.target.files); setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, documents: [...prev.documents, ...files] })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Audit Form Submitted:', formData); alert('Audit form submitted successfully!'); }; const nextSection = () => { if (currentSection < sections.length - 1) { setCurrentSection(currentSection + 1); } }; const prevSection = () => { if (currentSection > 0) { setCurrentSection(currentSection - 1); } }; return (

Social Audit Form

{index + 1}

)}
